newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: No S.African trade data today, likely next week.
newsitem.headline: No S.African trade data today, likely next week.

text.p: South Africa's trade balance for July will not be announced on Thursday, an official at the South African Revenue Services said.
The data was likely to be announced next week, although there was a chance it could be ready by Friday. Officials had earlier said the figures would be announced from Thursday.
Analysts polled by Reuters have forecast a 600 million rand surplus for the month, after a deficit of 27.6 million rand in June.
